prop.name: BeforeHeadersContainer
prop.p: This property defines a container put before tab page headers in the visual order. When objects are put in the BeforeHeaders property of the ribbon tab control, they will show up in this container.
If this property is null, objects in BeforeHeaders are invisible.

prop.name: AfterHeadersContainer
prop.p: This property defines a container put after tab page headers in the visual order. When objects are put in the AfterHeaders property of the ribbon tab control, they will show up in this container.
If this property is null, objects in AfterHeaders are invisible.
